column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Diy_coref|
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Diy_coref_re|BT_webanno.custom.Diy_coref

#Text=In one embodiment, the resident conditions of the combined carrier fluid and test sample are controlled by sealing the second port of the device prior to introducing the test sample into the receiving well.
#Text=The seal may be permanent or it may be removed after the assay is complete.

#Text=In another embodiment, the resident conditions are controlled by providing in the receiving well a plurality of flow-regulating solids, having a size and shape effective to permit passage of the motile cells from the receiving well into the channel and concomitantly to substantially restrain passage into the channel of selected particulate matter in the test sample.

#Text=In another embodiment, the resident conditions are controlled by providing in the receiving well a cell director comprising flow-guiding ribs longitudinally aligned with the channel, which function to direct the motile cells from the receiving well into the channel.

#Text=According to another aspect of the present invention, a method is provided similar to that described above, which further includes generating replicate sets of data by conducting the above-described method in a device which further comprises a plurality identical flow systems.
#Text=By conducting the methods simultaneously in each of the plurality of flow systems, replicate sets of data for the analysis are generated.
#Text=According to another aspect of the present invention, the methods described above further include conducting a plurality of different analyses on a single sample.

#Text=For this method, a device of the invention is provided which further comprises a multiplicity of non-identical flow systems designed for the plurality of analyses, each flow system being filled with a carrier fluid which optionally contains reagents for each analysis.
#Text=An aliquot of the sample is introduced into each receiving well, and the cells in each flow system are observed.
#Text=Data are collected based on those observations, and the analyses are made using the data.

#Text=According to yet another aspect of the present invention, a method is provided as described above which further includes selectively separating and optionally collecting a least one motile cell type from a sample comprising a mixed population of cell types.

#Text=In this method, a device is provided in which the flow channel comprises a selection region, adapted for selected separation of a cell type of interest and, optionally, for two or more cell types of interest.

#Text=The sample is introduced into the receiving well, whereafter the mixed population of cell types migrates through the selection region of the channel, resulting in selective separation of the motile cell type of interest from the mixed population of cell types.
#Text=The motile cell type can then be collected.
#Text=According to still another aspect of the present invention, a method is provided for performing in vitro fertilization.

#Text=An in vitro fertilization device, as described above, is filled with appropriate in vitro fertilization medium, one or more eggs in the egg nesting well and a sperm sample in the receiving well.

#Text=The in vitro fertilization device is then placed in a portable, sealable, environmental control chamber for a time and under conditions effective to enable the sperm to reach and fertilize the egg.
